mapper.sql: ID, OPERATOR_ID, USERS_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, UNDO_TYPE, RESULT, TITLE, REMARK, IS_DELETED, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, IS_REMINDERS

ID,

mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_AGENTS
OPERATOR_ID = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERS_ID = #{usersId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNDO_TYPE = #{undoType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_REMINDERS= #{isReminders,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNDO_STATUS= #{undoStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_AGENTS set OPERATOR_ID = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERS_ID = #{usersId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNDO_TYPE = #{undoType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_REMINDERS= #{isReminders,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNDO_STATUS= #{undoStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_AGENTS set OPERATOR_ID = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERS_ID = #{usersId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNDO_TYPE = #{undoType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_REMINDERS= #{isReminders,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNDO_STATUS= #{undoStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT sa.*,bu.REL_NAME as USER_NAME,BU1.REL_NAME AS OPERATOR_NAME FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_AGENTS sa INNER JOIN T_SES_BMS_USERINFO bu1 ON sa.USERS_ID=BU1."ID" INNER JOIN T_SES_BMS_USERINFO bu ON sa.OPERATOR_ID = bu."ID" WHERE SA.IS_DELETED =0 AND SA.IS_REMINDERS =#{isReminders,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
